attributes.action: Make England a colonial outpost of the Welsh Empire denying it legistlative powers and create a Welsh Prince of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create an influx of non-English speakers into England, providing housing and second housing for them, local culture and language will suffer-but tourism will flourish! That's what a "democratic union" does after all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
